channel.title: Having a bit of trouble with
channel.description:
Hi, i have a problem, sometimes after a bout 2 minute after a server restart, it is imposiible to login, it just says, Error connecting to server. must be down...
Although i know it is up because i can see other players autosaves ect
Anysolve? i may post pictures or a vid if noone has a clue?

item.title: Having a bit of trouble with
item.dc:creator: @Pkitten Pkitten
item.source: Having a bit of trouble with

item.title: Having a bit of trouble with
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Wait a minute, its the server taking time to save your files from your last play, it has to take a second to get ready to save more files from your new play…

Read full topic
item.source: Having a bit of trouble with

item.title: Having a bit of trouble with
item.dc:creator: @Pkitten Pkitten
item.description:
@Pkitten wrote:

Yes thanks but after i finally get on and logout i cant get back on, it just happens again

Read full topic
item.source: Having a bit of trouble with

item.title: Having a bit of trouble with
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

I understand your problem, it is ok. It is just that the server needs a second to get ready from the restart. My server did it, just wait 1 minute then log in. There is no way to fix it, it just means your server is normally very big.

Read full topic
item.source: Having a bit of trouble with

item.title: Having a bit of trouble with
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

So, if I get this right, you can’t log in, but others CAN?

Read full topic
